suggest.spryker-shop/customer-page: Widget plugins are available for this module.
suggest.spryker-shop/multi-cart-page: If you want to use CartToShoppingListWidgetPlugin: ^1.0.0
suggest.spryker-shop/product-detail-page: To use ShoppingListWidget plugin, ShoppingListWidgetPluginInterface from product-detail-page v0.2.2 is needed
suggest.spryker-shop/quick-order-page: If you want to use ShoppingListQuickOrderPageWidgetPlugin: ^1.0.0
suggest.spryker/router: Use this module when you want to use the Router.
suggest.spryker-shop/shopping-list-page: Use this module if you want see shopping list pages
suggest.spryker/silex: Use this module when using plugins that need Silex dependencies.
